page.description: Set the value of a 32-bit word of the blob.
page.original:
.POKED() Syntax .POKED( Position as N, Double_Word_Value as N ) ArgumentDescription PositionThe position to write the data. Double_Word_ValueA 32 bit value.
Description The .POKED() method sets a 32 bit double word at Position in a blob to a value. The first position is 1.The .POKED() method does not change the size of the blob. Use the <BLOB>.RESIZE() method to change the size of a blob. Examples b4 = file.to_blob("C:\Wallpaper\ruth_2_081003.jpg") b4.poked(10,12345)
See Also Blob Functions and Methods
